description: Test booking for a date far in the future.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is on the main booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the date field.
Select a date at least one year from the current date.
Enter a valid origin and destination.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Test booking for a past date.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is on the main booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the date field.
Select a date in the past (e.g., yesterday).
Enter a valid origin and destination.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Test search with a misspelled origin city.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is on the main booking screen
testing_steps: In the origin field, enter a misspelled city name (e.g., 'Chnna' instead of 'Chennai').
Enter a valid destination city.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Test search with a nonexistent location.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is on the main booking screen
testing_steps: In the origin or destination field, enter a made-up location name.
Enter other required details.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Test input fields with special characters.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is on the main booking screen
testing_steps: In the origin, destination, or any other relevant input field, enter special characters like  '#$%^&'.
Attempt to proceed with the booking process.

description: Test booking with the minimum and maximum number of seats allowed.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User has searched for a route and is presented with available buses
testing_steps: For minimum seats, set the number of seats to '0' (or the lowest possible value). Observe the app's behavior.
For maximum seats, set the number of seats to a very high value (e.g., '100'). Observe if the app sets a realistic limit.

description: Test payment with an expired card.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User has selected a bus and is proceeding to the payment gateway
testing_steps: In the payment details section, enter an expired credit/debit card number (the actual number is not essential; only the expiry date matters).
Fill in other required payment details.
Attempt to complete the payment.

description: Test booking process during network interruption.
pre_conditions: App is installed and open on the device.
User is in the middle of the booking process (e.g., selecting seats, entering payment details)
testing_steps: Turn off the device's Wi-Fi or mobile data connection to simulate a network interruption.
Continue with the booking process as if the connection was still active.
